channel.title: npc_ name for vortigaunt?
channel.description:
I've been attempting to make a video of the first part of On a Rail and have so far been able to remove most of the NPCs that spawn, but I can't seem to find the name used for vortigaunts. npc_vortigaunt comes up empty, and I know that two spawn in the map.
Anyone know what the name is? Or have a list that I've somehow missed?

item.title: npc_ name for vortigaunt?
item.dc:creator: Jenova19
item.description:
nerog:

Thanks!

Attention, standard reply incoming…:

You’re welcome!

Read full topic

item.title: npc_ name for vortigaunt?
item.dc:creator: Jenova19
item.description:
nerog:

-Snip-

Anyone know what the name is? Or have a list that I’ve somehow missed?

This:

Black Eagle:

Create a NPC: npc_create npc_*

List of all NPC:

npc_snark
npc_headcrab
npc_houndeye
npc_bullsquid
npc_ichthyosaur
npc_alien_slave
npc_alien_grunt
npc_alien_grunt_unarmored
npc_alien_controller
npc_gargantua
npc_tentacle

npc_zombie_scientist
npc_zombie_scientist_torso
npc_zombie_security

npc_human_scientist
npc_human_scientist_female
npc_human_scientist_eli
npc_human_scientist_kleiner
npc_human_security

npc_human_grunt
npc_human_medic
npc_human_commander
npc_human_grenadier
npc_human_assassin

npc_sentry_ceiling
npc_sentry_ground

npc_abrams
npc_lav
npc_apache
npc_osprey

When you have created the NPC, [COLOR=‘Red’]or you just want to give weapon to any ally, aim at it and in console write:

ent_fire !picker giveweapon weapon_*

I think allied npcs only know how to use:

weapon_glock
weapon_mp5
weapon_shotgun
weapon_357

(Source: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=498664&postcount=29)

Read full topic
